description: This file contains React-like component definitions for a note list UI, including individual note items and the container managing the list, as part of a frontend application.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches note items from the data provider and updates the list display, highlighting the selected note.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Sets up the click handler for the 'Create New Note' button.

methods.name: onFocus
methods.description: Manages focus behavior when the component gains focus, directing it to the list or create button appropriately.

methods.name: onUp
methods.description: Moves focus up within the list of notes.

methods.name: onDown
methods.description: Moves focus down within the list of notes.

methods.name: _moveFocus
methods.description: Internal method to navigate focus within list items based on direction (-1 for up, 1 for down).
